feed.title: Category: Git | 范琪的个人博客

entry.title: Git Commands
entry.content:
全局设置

git config --global user.name "fanqi"
git config --global user.email "oschina@fanqi.xyz"

C

创建

mkdir git-repo
cd git-repo
git init
touch README.md
git add README.md
git commit -m "first commit"
git remote add origin https://git.oschina.net/imfanqi/gitdemo.git
git push -u origin master

Existing project? cd existing-git-repo git remote add origin https://git.oschina.net/imfanqi/existing-git-repo.git git push -u origin master

资源

  1. http://my.oschina.net/yongbin45/blog/144250
